protocol.name: P-G3002-2
protocol.text: WT seeds incubated at 6 degrees for 5 d. Chilled seeds were exposed to 1 h of white light at 22 degrees to induce homogeneous seed germination. After 3 d in full D at 22 degrees seedlings were harvested

protocol.name: P-G3002-5
protocol.text: phyAphyB double mutant seeds incubated at 6 degrees for 5 d. Chilled seeds were exposed to 1 h of white light at 22 degrees to induce homogeneous seed germination. After 3 d in full D at 22 degrees seedlings were harvested
